Aditya Amatya

Mechanical Engineer

I am an Engineer and I'm passionate about solving problems.

I received my Bachelor in Mechanical Engineering in 2019 from Pulchowk Campus, Institute of Engineering, Tribhuvan University. During my college, I did various projects that honed me in learning different aspects of mechanical engineering. I performed a group project on fixed-wing Unmanned Aerial Vehicle(UAV) as a final year project. At present, I'm working as a Mechanical Design Engineer at Entegra Sources Pvt. Ltd., an outsourcing company that offers engineering services.

I'm interested in research and development and passionate about mechanical engineering for the greater good of society. I'm experienced in CAD modelling and mechanical analysis and concerned with product design through both, Engineering and Reverse Engineering. Currently, I am actively looking for Phd Position in Mechanical Engineering.

Outside of academics, I like playing chess, reading, hiking and viewing nature.
